description: This file defines a class SQLTools that provides methods for interacting with a SQL database, including listing tables, describing table schemas, and executing SQL queries. It uses SQLAlchemy for database connections and inspection.

classes.name: SQLTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for executing and inspecting SQL database schemas and data.

methods.name: list_tables
methods.description: Returns a JSON string of the list of table names in the database or the provided tables dictionary.

methods.name: describe_table
methods.description: Returns a JSON string describing the columns of a specified table.

methods.name: run_sql_query
methods.description: Executes a SQL query and returns the result as a JSON string, with optional row limit.

methods.name: run_sql
methods.description: Internal method that executes a SQL statement and returns the result as a list of dictionaries.
